title: Effect of USD appreciation on AD in the short run

content.prompt: If the value of the United States dollar increases on the foreign exchange market, which of the following is most likely to occur in the short run?

choices.label: Both aggregate demand and aggregate supply will decrease.
Both aggregate demand and aggregate supply will increase.

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.5: Changes in the Foreign Exchange Market and Net Exports

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
